Text: One more questionsmith PST Doug Thank you for meeting with us on Friday that was a very informative meeting We really appreciate that you took the time to come to the Commission and meet with us I hope you will be able to send me the code to access Enron Online soon it will be most useful to me if I can get it before the end of this week I have one additional question for you If a REP wanted to hedge against market price risk or volume risk and approached you to get a sense of the cost of hedging these types of risk what information would you give that person to help him assess the cost of hedging his risk What are some of the variables and what are some strategies to mitigate risk while keeping costs at a minimum I think you mentioned a couple of interesting strategies when we met if you could go over those that would greatly help me Thank you for sharing your knowledge with us and thank you for your time Cordially Danielle Jaussaud Director of Economic Strategic Analysis Market Oversight Division Public Utility Commission of Texas mailto

Preparation for meetingsmith PST Doug I sent you an email message yesterday offering a phone conference as an alternative to a meeting at the Commission and am awaiting your response I am enclosing the data and charts we analyzed for the Enron QSE We strongly encourage your QSE people to verify our data against their own data and generate similar graphs from their own data so we can be sure that we are looking at the same data when we talk Best regards LI QSExls Danielle Jaussaud Director of Economic Analysis Market Oversight Division Public Utility Commission of Texas phone Fax LI QSExls

Load schedule data Cc Jim This is the load schedule data that the PUC Market Oversight Division analyzed concering overscheduling of load in August of this year and that we would like to discuss with the ENRON QSE LI QSExls Danielle Jaussaud Director of Economic Analysis Market Oversight Division Public Utility Commission of Texas phone Fax LI QSExls
